verses.verse: And it came to pass a long<WH7227> time<WH3117> after<WH310> that the Lord<WH3068> had given rest<WH5117> unto Israel<WH3478> from all their enemies<WH341> round about<WH5439>, that Joshua<WH3091> grew old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in age<WH3117>.

And Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all Israel<WH3478>, and for their elders<WH2205>, and for their heads<WH7218>, and for their judges<WH8199>, and for their officers<WH7860>, and said<WH559> unto them<WH2204>, I am old and stricken<WH935> in age<WH3117>:

And you have seen<WH7200> all that the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has done<WH6213> unto all these nations<WH1471> because<WH6440> of you<WH3068>; for the Lord your God<WH430> is he that has fought for you<WH3898>.

Behold<WH7200>, I have divided<WH5307> unto you by lot these nations<WH1471> that remain<WH7604>, to be an inheritance<WH5159> for your tribes<WH7626>, from Jordan<WH3383>, with all the nations<WH1471> that I have cut off<WH3772>, even unto the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> westward<WH3996>.

And the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, he shall expel<WH1920> them from before<WH6440> you<WH3423>, and drive them from out of your sight<WH6440>; and you shall possess<WH3423> their land<WH776>, as the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has promised unto you<WH1696>.

Be you therefore very<WH3966> courageous<WH2388> to keep<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> all that is written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> of Moses<WH4872>, that you turn<WH5493> not aside therefrom to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left<WH8040>;

That you come<WH935> not among these nations<WH1471>, these that remain<WH7604> among you<WH2142>; neither make mention of the name<WH8034> of their gods<WH430>, nor cause to swear<WH7650> by them<WH5647>, neither serve them<WH7812>, nor bow yourselves unto them:
But cleave<WH1692> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, as you have done<WH6213> unto this day<WH3117>.

For the Lord<WH3068> has driven out<WH3423> from before<WH6440> you great<WH1419> nations<WH1471> and strong<WH6099>: but as for you<WH376>, no man has been able to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you unto this day<WH3117>.
One<WH259> man<WH376> of you shall chase<WH7291> a thousand<WH505>: for the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, he it is that fights<WH3898> for you<WH1696>, as he has promised you.
Take good<WH3966> care<WH8104> therefore unto yourselves<WH5315>, that you love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>.

Else if you do in any wise<WH7725> go back<WH7725>, and cleave<WH1692> unto the remnant<WH3499> of these nations<WH1471>, even these that remain<WH7604> among you<WH2859>, and shall make marriages with them<WH935>, and go in unto them, and they to you:

Know<WH3045> for a certainty<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will no more<WH3254> drive out<WH3423> any of these nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> you<WH6341>; but they shall be snares and traps<WH4170> unto you<WH7850>, and scourges in your sides<WH6654>, and thorns<WH6796> in your eyes<WH5869>, until you perish<WH6> from off this good<WH2896> land<WH127> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given you<WH5414>.

And<WH3117>, behold, this day I am going<WH1980> the way<WH1870> of all the earth<WH776>: and you know<WH3045> in all your hearts<WH3824> and in all your souls<WH5315>, that not one<WH259> thing<WH1697> has failed<WH5307> of all the good<WH2896> things<WH1697> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> concerning you<WH935>; all are come to pass unto you<WH259>, and not one thing<WH1697> has failed there<WH5307>.

Therefore it shall come to pass<WH2896>, that as all good things<WH1697> are come<WH935> upon you<WH3068>, which the Lord your God<WH430> promised<WH1696> you<WH3068>; so shall the Lord bring<WH935> upon you all evil<WH7451> things<WH1697>, until he have destroyed<WH8045> you from off this good<WH2896> land<WH127> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given you<WH5414>.

When you have transgressed<WH5674> the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, which he commanded<WH6680> you<WH1980>, and have gone and served<WH5647> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, and bowed<WH7812> yourselves to them<WH639>; then shall the anger of the Lord<WH3068> be kindled<WH2734> against you<WH6>, and you shall perish quickly<WH4120> from off the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which he has given unto you<WH5414>.
